channel.title: Mods, who is the best and who is the worst?
channel.description:
WOOT!!! FINALLY SENIOR MEMBER!!!!! i just recently recieved senior member for posting 100 times (:
ok so back to the topic what mods do yu like?
i like:
si force tahrock moparisthebest (not sucking up, he is a gr8 guy) fat cookies (nazi lol)
mod(s) i dislike: rich'
regular members i also respect- jmood davidi2 && some others but i dont remember their names
who do u like/dislike?

item.title: Mods, who is the best and who is the worst?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

There have been many threads about this. In true honesty, none of us really care if people favor us over another. Moderating is volunteer work.

Read full topic
item.source: Mods, who is the best and who is the worst?

item.title: Mods, who is the best and who is the worst?
item.dc:creator: @teh_codex teh_codex
item.description:
@teh_codex wrote:

You cant be serious… this topic is really pathetic… no offence to who likes it. but personally i think that there is no good or bad mods they all are people like us and just do there jobs. or in this case. Do as they like.
